# Government Tender Announcement
### Procurement Title
**Title in English:** W3555-240702 - Ultrasonic Cleaning System
**Title in French:** W3555-240702 - Système de nettoyage par ultrasons

### Request for Proposal Details
#### Solicitation Number
WS4113906941
#### Publication Date
2023-10-25
#### Tender Closing Date
2023-11-16 14:00:00 (EDT)
#### Amendment Number
3, Amended on 2023-11-14

### Procurement Classification
#### UNSPSC Code
*46182400: Decontamination aids and safety cleaning equipment*
#### UNSPSC Description (English)
Decontamination aids and safety cleaning equipment
#### UNSPSC Description (French)
Equipements de nettoyage et de décontamination

### Procurement Method
The procurement method for this tender is Competitive - Open Bidding.
#### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this tender is variations or combinations of the methods mentioned in this document.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization’s (WTO) Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Delivery Locations
The goods required will be delivered to British Columbia, Canada.

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the end-user client is the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Name of Contact
Darlene Thorne (SPAC/PSPC)
#### Email Contact
darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a Ultrasonic Cleaning System for use in a clean room at the Heavy Mechanical Work Centre (HMW) at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB). The system will be used for cleaning oxygen systems components to support/repair Submarine breathing air, Diving breathing air, Recompression chamber breathing air, and liquid oxygen fueling.

#### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17813242
